body:

There are at least 6 options as I could see in page 9,  the options are I think (In no particular order since it just keeps changing the order.)
1. Body Control
2. Brainwashing
3. Sluttiness
4. Sensitivity
5. Common Sense changes
6. Personality change (I think?)
Well that's all I could gather.
